aircraft.value: Hornet Strike - AC-8547-928 at Zone-2 Facility

defect_observed.value: Trim tab actuator binding. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Cargo Handling component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 03/12/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 04/12/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 07/12/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 08/12/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 10/12/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Trim tab actuator binding. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Cargo Handling component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
